name: Circuit Connect
description:
The goal is to connect the circuit pins to restore the electrical power supply before the energy source runs out.

A game for Nokia Jam 3.

Controls:

Numpad 4 / Numpad 6Left / RightNumpad 8 / Numpad 2
Up / DownNumpad 1 / Numpad 3Select a Wire iconNumpad 5Plug a WireNumpad .Delete a WireNumpad 0Pause Menu

Install instructions

  • Download the right version for your platform (Windows or Linux)
  • Extract the zip
  • Find and open the executable

Please do not change the hierarchies of the main directories.

Credits:
